name: Unknown Memories
description: A hero was chosen by the goddess to stop the Demon Lord Xarkas from destroying Terra. But then the hero lost his memories after losing the fight with Xarkas, explore the world to regain your memories and recruit other heroes to help you fight the Demon Lord Xarkas. Choose your best equipment and upgrade them to get stronger. Level up and learn skills, each hero has their own unique skill. Kill the demon lord and save the world of Terra from its demise.
